findings.details: Common setup steps (checkout, setup-python, uv) are repeated across jobs. This is acceptable for CI/CD as each job runs in isolation. Consider composite actions for large projects.
Job names are clear (lint, typecheck, test, build). Step names describe actions (Run Ruff linter, Run tests with coverage).
PR title validation includes example formats. Workflow names are descriptive.
continue-on-error used appropriately for non-critical checks (Codecov, safety). Critical checks fail the workflow.
tests/test_ci_workflows.py validates workflow structure, required jobs, and Python version. 8 test cases covering key aspects.
Single Responsibility: Each job has one purpose. Open/Closed: Easy to add new jobs without modifying existing ones.
Python version in env variable. Coverage threshold (70%) is explicit. File size limit (1MB) is documented.

recommendation: APPROVED - Code quality meets standards. Good test coverage for workflow validation.
